message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product that I believe is worth a lot to you. I'm starting at $14000.  Let me know what you think.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to offer $12000 for it.
Bob, I appreciate your offer but I need to make a bit more to make this worthwhile for me. How about $13000?  It's still a good price for you and gives me some room to make this deal work.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate it. I would like to counter with an offer of $12500 for the product.
